original_text: And he set the altar of burnt offering at the entrance of the tabernacle of the tent of meeting, and offered on it the burnt offering and the grain offering, as the Lord had commanded Moses.
korean_text: 또 회막의 성막 문 앞에 번제단을 두고 번제와 소제를 그 위에 드리니 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 되니라

sentences.original_text: And he set the altar of burnt offering
at the entrance of the tabernacle of the tent of meeting
the burnt offering and the grain offering
as the Lord had commanded Moses.
